name: Shoot the Moon (itch) (scyq)
description:
Game Off 2020

Game Off 2020

Theme: Moonshot

Engine: Godot

Author: @scyq

Description

Use your wisdom to control your brick fleet and hit the moon more times. Bricks have health, and the durability of bricks is not unlimited. Death does not mean failure, hitting the moon is our ultimate goal.

P1 uses the arrow to control the direction, right Shift to reorganize the bricks.

P2 controls the direction through WASD, and the space bar reorganizes the bricks.

GitHub Page @scyq
